Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that no Austin City Council member lives south of Lady Bird Lake or north of 45th Street, when in fact there are council members who live south of 45th Street.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the location of council members' residences is important or relevant to their ability to serve on the council.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that no council member lives south of Lady Bird Lake or north of 45th Street.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the location of council members' residences, such as personal preferences or availability of housing options, that are not considered in the claim.
